name: Linoone
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

attacks.name: Switcheroo
attacks.effect: Move a Pokémon Tool card attached to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon to another of your opponent’s Pokémon (excluding Pokémon that already has a Pokémon Tool attached to it). (If an effect of this attack is prevented, this attack does nothing.)

attacks.name: Overrun
attacks.effect: Does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
